column2:
"...I'm sorry to trouble you, but I believe you can keep a secret.
I have a request to make of you."

"I need this cookie delivered...
Find the one who awaits it and hand it over."

"You... don't know who I mean...?
I think you do...
Their name ends with an 'S'..."

"...Yerkes?!
Are you making fun of me?!
You know who I mean... Stratos!"

"Why not do it myself? Heheheh, because if I were to hand her such a thing, she would be so overcome with surprise she would likely faint...
It can only be you."

"I should still do it myself...?
Just get on with it!
My means may be unorthodox, but my duty as a man will be fulfilled!"
